scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Information
scopecontent.p: This collection consists of a two page autograph letter of recommendation for a teaching position for a former pupil, Charles S. Winston, June 16, 1857, from Presbyterian minister and pastor of a church in Staunton, Joseph Ruggles Wilson (1822-1903), the father of Woodrow Wilson. Wilson identifies himself as "formerly Professor of Chemistry & Natural Philosophy in Hampden Sidney College." He was also instrumental in organizing the Presbyterian church of the Confederate States of America and supported the South during the Civil War.
